name: Curepathy - An App to Deepen Children's Interests
description: This is an application designed to support active learning for elementary and middle school students. It presents learning content tailored to the user's interests through user ratings, tags, and a recommendation engine. Additionally, it incorporates elements of dress-up games to provide an enjoyable and continuous learning experience.
